## Load Data

## Plot

```{r}
# HER2-FISH vs HER2 Rezeptor
ggplot(augment_data, aes(x = her2_status, y = her2_fish, fill = her2_status)) +
  geom_boxplot() +
  theme_minimal() +
  labs(title = "HER2-FISH Stärke nach HER2-Rezeptorstatus",
       x = "HER2 Rezeptor",
       y = "HER2-FISH") +
  scale_fill_brewer(palette = "Set1") +
  theme(legend.position = "none")

```

```{r}
ggplot(augment_data, aes(x = as.numeric(tumor_size_before), y = her2_fish)) +
  geom_jitter(width = 0.2, alpha = 0.5) +
  geom_smooth(method = "lm", se = TRUE, color = "blue") +
  theme_minimal() +
  labs(x = "Tumorgröße (Stufen numerisch)", y = "HER2-FISH",
       title = "Lineare Regression: HER2-FISH vs Tumorgröße")
```
